pages.disclaimers: Legal Disclaimers and Policies at SofaLuxe - Ensuring Transparency and Trustworthiness SofaLuxe HOME ABOUT US SOFA CONTACT Disclaimers SofaLuxe strives to provide accurate information on its website. However, we cannot guarantee that all information is completely free of errors or omissions. We reserve the right to make changes to the content of the website at any time without prior notice. The information presented on the SofaLuxe website is for informational purposes only and should not be construed as professional advice. We recommend consulting with a qualified professional before making any decisions based on the information provided on this website. Product Disclaimer We strive to accurately represent our products on our website. However, product images may differ slightly from the actual product due to variations in lighting and screen resolution. We also reserve the right to change product specifications without prior notice. Pricing Disclaimer Prices listed on the SofaLuxe website are subject to change without notice. We will make every effort to ensure that prices are accurate, but errors may sometimes occur. We reserve the right to correct any pricing errors. Warranty Disclaimer Information regarding product warranties can be found on the product pages or in the warranty documents included with your purchase. We disclaim any warranties or guarantees not expressly stated in the product warranty. Limitation of Liability SofaLuxe shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of the information provided on this website. This includes, but is not limited to, direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, and punitive damages. SofaLuxe website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | SofaLuxe - Your Privacy Matters to Us SofaLuxe HOME ABOUT US SOFA CONTACT Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is SofaLuxe's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website and other sites we own and operate. Information We Collect We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used. We may collect the following types of information: Contact information including name, email address, and phone number. Demographic information such as postcode, preferences, and interests. Other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: Provide, operate, and maintain our website Improve, personalize, and expand our website Understand and analyze how you use our website Develop new products, services, features, and functionality Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes Send you emails Find and prevent fraud SofaLuxe website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline SofaLuxe Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions
